info.name: MediCommerce CMS API
info.description: API collection for the MediCommerce CMS module

item.name: Public Endpoints

request.description: List all published pages with optional filters
Get page details by slug

query.description: Filter by position (home_top, home_middle, home_bottom, etc.)

request.description: List all active banners with optional position filter

item.name: Blog

query.description: Search in title, content, and excerpt

request.description: List all published blog posts with optional filters
Get blog post details by slug (also increments view count)
List all blog categories
List all blog tags

item.description: Public endpoints for blog posts, categories, and tags

query.description: Filter by category (general, ordering, payments, etc.)

request.description: List all active FAQs with optional category filter
List all active testimonials with optional featured filter

item.description: Public endpoints for the CMS API

request.description: Admin endpoint to list all pages with optional filters

body.raw:
{ "title": "About Medical Products", "content": "

This is the content of the about medical products page.

", "excerpt": "Learn about our medical products and services.", "status": "published", "template": "medical", "seo_title": "About Medical Products - MediCommerce", "seo_description": "Learn about our high-quality medical products and services.", "seo_keywords": "medical products, medical services, healthcare", "is_featured": true, "show_in_nav": true, "parent": null, "order": 3 }

body.raw:
{ "title": "Health Benefits of Exercise", "content": "

Exercise is essential for maintaining good health.

", "excerpt": "Discover the numerous health benefits of regular exercise.", "status": "published", "is_featured": true, "categories": [1], "tags": [2], "seo_title": "Health Benefits of Exercise - MediCommerce", "seo_description": "Learn about the health benefits of regular exercise.", "seo_keywords": "exercise, health, fitness" }

request.description: Admin endpoint to create a new blog post
(Admin) Get blog post details by slug (also increments view count)

body.raw:
{ "title": "Health Benefits of Exercise (Updated)", "content": "

Exercise is essential for maintaining good health and well-being.

", "excerpt": "Discover the numerous health benefits of regular exercise and fitness.", "status": "published", "is_featured": true, "categories": [1], "tags": [2], "seo_title": "Health Benefits of Exercise - MediCommerce", "seo_description": "Learn about the health benefits of regular exercise and fitness.", "seo_keywords": "exercise, health, fitness" }
